text: She also bore Shaaph, the father of Madmannah, Sheva, the father of Machbenah, and the father of Gibea. Achsah was Caleb’s daughter.
descendants of Uzza, descendants of Paseah, descendants of Besai,
Farewell of Mattathias. When the time came for Mattathias to die, he said to his sons: “Arrogance and scorn have now grown strong; it is a time of disaster and violent wrath.
At Daniel’s request the king made Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego administrators of the province of Babylon, while Daniel himself remained at the king’s court.
And he said to them, “Why were you looking for me? Did you not know that I must be in my Father’s house?”
